title: Step Up Your Sex Life in 2015
itunes:title: Step Up Your Sex Life in 2015
itunes:subtitle: Step Up Your Sex Life in 2015
description:
It’s a new year, meaning a new chance to change your life for the better! Sure you can promise to hit the gym or floss your teeth everyday but why not commit to something that will bring you pleasure all year long? This show is all about making a commitment to have better sex and better relationships in 2015!

 

This year, take responsibility for your own sexual pleasure, say goodbye to sexual ruts and leave those post-sex regrets in 2014.  Emily explains why you should move on from relationships that are holding you back and try at least one (or two) new thing in the bedroom this year.

This episode will inspire you to make some important changes and take your sex and dating life to the next level. Check it out!

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
